channel.title: TorBroswer javascript
channel.description:
Hi, I have switched to Qubes and updated to Whonix GW and WS 16. Why is javascript true in the tor browser? Do I need to do more torbrowser configurations so that the browser is configured exactly as under virtualbox in the ws? Why are there differences?
best regards ano

item.title: TorBroswer javascript
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Ano:

Why is javascript true in the tor browser?

See: You should Disable JavaScript by Default!

Ano:

Do I need to do more torbrowser configurations so that the browser is configured exactly as under virtualbox in the ws?

No.

Generally, see:

Whonix – 11 Dec 21

Tor Browser Essentials

Using Tor Browser in Whonix ™. Anonymity vs Pseudonymity, HTTPS Everywhere, Torbutton, Protection against dangerous JavaScript, NoScript, Tips, Update Tor Browser, Browser Plugins, Change Language

Ano:

Why are there differences?

There are minimal unavoidable difference Tor Browser Bundle versus Whonix ™ Tor Browser which are documented here:
Whonix ™ Tor Browser Differences

Ano:

Why are there differences?

I don’t think there are. You might be mistaken. At time of writing, Whonix for VirtualBox vs Qubes-Whonix does not have different javascript enabled/disabled default settings.

See also:
Tor Browser Functionality on Different Platforms

Read full topic
